General.Name: Megapower Makmur TBK PT
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: PT Megapower Makmur Tbk operates as an independent power producing company in Indonesia. The company generates and operates electricity from various energy sources, such as nuclear, coal, gas, fuel oil, diesel and renewable energy, hydroelectric power, solar, wind, marine, and geothermal, as well as provides power plant operation and maintenance services. PT Megapower Makmur Tbk was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Komplek Galeri Niaga Mediterania 2, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14460
